title: Kansas Soils (USDA NRCS SSURGO Database)
description: Soil survey polygons and attributes from the USDA NRCS SSURGO database, clipped to Kansas. Includes soil series, texture, drainage class, and agricultural capability indices. High-resolution coverage suitable for county- and field-level analysis.

endpoints.notes: SSURGO soils data from USDA NRCS Soil Data Access API and Geospatial Data Gateway. Coverage is county-based, merged for statewide mosaic.

steps: Fetch county SSURGO datasets via NRCS Geospatial Data Gateway
Merge county geodatabases into statewide soil layer
Retain soil attribute tables (map unit, component, horizon)

lineage: Attributes preserved: soil series, texture, drainage, capability classes
notes: For generalized statewide analysis, consider STATSGO2. SSURGO is detailed (field scale) and ideal for historical agricultural overlays.
